item.title: The job market is still pretty solid -- but there are warning signs ahead
item.description: U.S. employers added 151,000 jobs in February, while the unemployment rate inched up to 4.1% from 4% in January.

item.title: She got her dream job at CDC back. But she's already moving on
item.description: An unknown number of fired CDC workers got their jobs back this week. Among them was Bri McNulty, who had shared her story with NPR.
